verses.roman:
eta bali' paṇḍita prabhura sthāne āilā
rodana kariyā prabhura caraṇe paḍilā

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; paṇḍita—Gadādhara Paṇḍita; prabhura sthāne—to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āilā—came; rodana kariyā—crying; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; caraṇe—at the lotus feet; paḍilā—fell down.
translation: After saying this, Gadādhara Paṇḍita went to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and fell down crying at the lotus feet of the Lord.
